The files in this directory are from Dean Edwards' excellent IE7 compatibility
scripts to work around compliance bugs in Internet Explorer. Human-readable versions can be downloaded from his site - the scripts included with Plone
are compressed to take up as little bandwidth as possible.

Dean Edwards' web site:
http://dean.edwards.name/IE7/

The code is licensed under the LGPL:
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/LGPL/2.1/

The Plone Team would like to express their sincere thanks to Dean Edwards and
his work, and for licensing it under the LGPL.
